code: import Axios from'axios';export default{googleBooks:function googleBooks(query){return Axios.get("https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q=".concat(query));},saveBook:function saveBook(book){return Axios.post('/api/books/',book);},getBooks:function getBooks(){return Axios.get('/api/books/');},deleteBook:function deleteBook(book){return Axios.delete('/api/books/'+book);}};
